MY.notes: Manufacturing and E&E exports support steady growth. Inflation remains contained within the policy band.
MY.description_marquee: Malaysia 2025 outlook: diversified exports, digital economy expansion, and resilient domestic demand.

ID.notes: Consumption and infrastructure investment continue to drive growth.
ID.description_marquee: Indonesia 2025 outlook: strong consumption, green transition momentum, and digital inclusion programs.

SG.notes: High-value services and trade hub status reinforce external balances.
SG.description_marquee: Singapore 2025 outlook: services-led growth and continued innovation investments.

VN.notes: Manufacturing relocation tailwinds and export diversification continue.
VN.description_marquee: Viet Nam 2025 outlook: supply chain integration, manufacturing expansion, and human capital upskilling.

TH.notes: Tourism recovery complements steady domestic demand.
TH.description_marquee: Thailand 2025 outlook: tourism rebound and targeted industrial policy.
